thread.title: The Best Twitter Reactions to Moonlight Actually Winning Best Picture Oscar Over La La Land
thread.title_full: The Best Twitter Reactions to Moonlight Actually Winning Best Picture Oscar Over La La Land

title: The Best Twitter Reactions to Moonlight Actually Winning Best Picture Oscar Over La La Land
text:
— Rowan Blanchard (@RowanBlanchard) February 27, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 
— Tyra Banks (@tyrabanks) February 27, 2017 Most Popular 
— Chloë Grace Moretz (@ChloeGMoretz) February 27, 2017 . @RecordingAcad Well, bitch I need to make sure the envelope really said "25". pic.twitter.com/9S9h0xU80p 
— THE BEYHIVÉ (@TheBeyHiveTeam) February 27, 2017 MOONLIGHT WON THE ELECTORAL COLLEGE. #Oscars 
— Grace Parra (@GraceParra360) February 27, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Most nights, I have a dream in which what just happened at the #Oscars actually happened on election night. 
— Chris Murphy (@ChrisMurphyCT) February 27, 2017 Ye !! #Moonlight cannot be denied... WINNER!! WINNER!!! WINNER!! @BandryBarry & the entire cast and crew CONGRATS! In tears, yes damnit! 
— Gabrielle Union (@itsgabrielleu) February 27, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 
— BD WONG (@BD_WONG) February 27, 2017 Most Popular 
— Mike Birbiglia (@birbigs) February 27, 2017 Just so we are clear: Neither Steve Harvey nor I just f-ed up the #Oscars  
— Montel Williams (@Montel_Williams) February 27, 2017 Wh ??!congratulations Moonlight! My favorite #Oscars in memory!! 
— Oprah Winfrey (@Oprah) February 27, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 
— Professor Snape (@_Snape_) February 27, 2017 Why didn't the producers of the show rush to the stage when the wrong winner had been announced?! I feel bad for #lalaland producers AWKWARD pic.twitter.com/bs2S7rj325 
— Jessica Chastain (@jes_chastain) February 27, 2017 I wrote the ending of the academy awards 2017. @jimmykimmel we really got them! 
— M. Night Shyamalan (@MNightShyamalan) February 27, 2017 You know what the problem is -- millions of Academy members voted illegally. 
— Seth MacFarlane (@SethMacFarlane) February 27, 2017 More from ELLE:
